ll see what they can do with this software and programs. 
=C2=A0
Getting im=
ages from our audio and employing visual modalities with EVP & GBC "seems" =
like the other half and missing piece to what we do. It makes so much sense=
 to me and if it works as suggested will allow our depth of communication t=
o extend so much=C2=A0further than it has prior to this...almost like a con=
scious mind (GBC, surface messages) and the subconscious mind (sound/audio =
imaging and everything that lies beneath the surface) sort of thing. 
=C2=
=A0
I really get a good, STRONG feeling about this. It seems so obvious! =
=C2=A0
